dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6602 IH: To amend the Export Control Reform Act of 2018 relating to the review of the interagency dispute resolution process.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. McCormick introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To amend the Export Control Reform Act of 2018 relating to the review of the interagency dispute resolution process.

section.header: Review of interagency dispute resolution process
section.text: Section 1763(c) of the Export Control Reform Act of 2018 (50 U.S.C. 4822(c)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by inserting “countries subject to a comprehensive United States arms embargo,” after “matters relating to”; and
by striking “may be decided” and inserting “shall be decided”.
